Class ByStateCount

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.domain.visitor.reports.ByStateCount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Report
public final class ByStateCount extends Object implements Report
Report data structure that aggregates the number of tasks per TaskState.

Provides both generic access methods (count(TaskState), inc(TaskState)) and convenience accessors for individual states (todo(), inProgress(), completed()).

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

      Creates a new ByStateCount with all counters initialized to zero.

    • ByStateCount

      public ByStateCount(int todo, int inProgress, int completed)
      Creates a new ByStateCount with explicit counts.
      Parameters:
      todo - initial count of tasks in TaskState.ToDo
      inProgress - initial count of tasks in TaskState.InProgress
      completed - initial count of tasks in TaskState.Completed

      Increments the counter corresponding to the given state.
      Parameters:
      state - the task state to increment

    • count

      public int count(TaskState state)
      Returns the count for the given state.
      Parameters:
      state - the task state to query
      Returns:
      number of tasks recorded in the specified state

      Returns the count of tasks in TaskState.ToDo.
      Returns:

      Returns:
